common parse function for file transfer command

Parameters:

string &  dietConfig,
string &  trCmdStr,
string &  src,

)

To build options for the VISHNU copy of file command.

Parameters:
pgName The name of the command
dietConfig Represents the VISHNU config file
trCmdStr The command to use to perform file transfer
src The source file to copy following the pattern [host:]file path
dest The path of the destination file
Returns:
The built option
